details.text: I wanted to create polaroid style photos. They are actually pretty simple to make, you can just add padding around the photo, but the key is that on the bottom the padding needs to be larger.  You can certainly use css to do this, but I wanted to do this with imgix so the image that is indexed later in google still looks like this.  I set a general padding number, then a larger pad-bottom number, and then declared what color I wanted these padded areas to be.
